# group

**Instance Property**

The group that the component’s entity belongs to.

## Declaration

```swift
var group: ModelSortGroup { get set }
```

## Discussion

The renderer only draws entities with the same [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ModelSortGroup] relative to each other.
title: group
